unnormalised: Arre yaar, property prices in Mumbai are insane! I saw a 1BHK in Andheri for ₹1.5 Cr! And the sq ft rate is like ₹25,000 easily. My broker said it might even go up by 10% next year. How does anyone even afford a house these days? Even the down payment is around 20 lakhs!
normalised: Arre yaar, property prices in Mumbai are insane! I saw a one B-H-K in Andheri for rupee one point five crore! And the square feet rate is like rupee twenty five thousand easily. My broker said it might even go up by ten percent next year. How does anyone even afford a house these days? Even the down payment is around twenty lakhs!
